comment: She was really sweet and understanding! Overall she didn't teach me much that I did not already know, but very easy class and overall just a caring professor.
If you just want to knock out an easy prerequisite, than take this class. I'm not a great writer but not a bad one either, I just didn't learn much. She is a very caring and sweet person.

Professor McDowell does a great job explaining everything with your essays and smaller assignments. I have never had a better English teacher. She is very flexible with dates and cares about you. She changes lessons to fit your needs to have a better knowledge of the subject.
She was very nice but very soft she gave us 2 weeks for a paper one time and is clearly very new its an easy a class. Under no circumstances will she answer emails.
